name: cordova-plugin-app-checker
description: Checks whether Android app is installed and enabled or not on Cordova.

scripts.testing:setup: cordova create playground org.cpcwc.playground Playground && cd ./playground && cordova platform add android && cordova plugin add ..
scripts.testing:reset: cd ./playground && cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-app-checker && cordova plugin add ..
scripts.testing:start: npm run testing:reset && cd ./playground && cordova run android
